heading: death toll now 9
subheading: nine students are now confirmed dead after a 40-foot-high pile of logs being stacked for a bonfire collapsed at texas a&m early thursday, crushing and trapping the students who were climbing on it. at least 28 others were injured, some critically, when the logs collapsed. the bonfire, an annual fixture at a&m, was being constructed for a pep rally next week preceding the football game against archrival texas.
author: wired staff
text: nine students are now confirmed dead after a 40-foot-high pile of logs being stacked for a bonfire collapsed at texas a&m early thursday, crushing and trapping the students who were climbing on it. at least 28 others were injured, some critically, when the logs collapsed. the bonfire, an annual fixture at a&m, was being constructed for a pep rally next week preceding the football game against archrival texas.
